publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2057 Mr Jim Wallace: The International Criminal Court (Immunities and Privileges) Order 2001—That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft International Criminal Court (Immunities and Privileges) Order 2001 be approved. Supported by: Iain Gray*
